text: Gluta curtisii is a species of plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It is a tree found in Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo. Any contact with this plant causes severe rash symptoms. ==References== curtisii Category:Trees of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Flora of Sarawak Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Gluta curtisii
